actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to eliminate the requirement for inspections of the mobile home manufacturing process by the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs.

summary.text: Eliminates the requirement for inspections of the mobile home manufacturing process by the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs in connection with the granting of loans to veterans for the purchase of such homes.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to eliminate the requirement for inspections of the mobile home manufacturing process by the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs.
